data.title: Great venue
data.text: Finally had a chance to attend a performance the "Unmasked Phantom" excellent performance. It's a small place but if offers great seating because of the smaller scale. They have great events coming up and I'm looking forward to attending. They sell chips, soda and alcohol before the performance at a reasonable price. You may dress up and/or go business casual. Great location with a restaurant within walking distance and Dunkin' Donuts. Parking is right across the venue for free they also have a covered garage close by.

data.title: Miramar Cultural Center
data.text: Located at Civic Center Place, with exhibits towards opera, dance, art . The current exhibit: "Awakening Jamaica".

data.title: The ANSIN ART GALLERY at MIramar Cultural Center /ARTS PARK
data.text: Miramar Cultural Center so energy and passion for ART , dance, opera, art exhibition, parties... ART GALLERY, is two large wall, great lighting, after opera or performance .. Photography by Pete Souza (Photographer White House)
